excerpt: My Own Style is a webshop where users can also customise their own products. I translated the graphic designs into templates and implemented the in Wordpress with Woocommerce as a webshop. Since customizeable products are rather tricky I had to code numerous implementations myself where normally you’d use existing plugins.
title: My Own Style
content:
My Own Style is a webshop where users can also customise their own products. A shoe for instance can be made up of five variable parts.
I translated the graphic designs into templates and implemented the in WordPress with Woocommerce as a webshop.
Since customizeable products are rather tricky I had to code numerous implementations myself where normally you’d use existing plugins.
